#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;
int d[] = {0,1,4,3,8,5,2,7,6,9};

long long int D(long long int n){
	if(n/10)return ( D(n/10) + D(n%10) )%10;
	return d[n];
}

long long int C(long long int n){
	if(n%10 == 0)return 45*(n/10);
	else return C(n-1) + D(n-1);
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		long long int a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		cout<<C(b+1)-C(a)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
